channel.title: Hugs in the Air
channel.description: Hugs in the Air is a gentle podcast for anyone who needs a little company. It feels like listening to a long-distance friend talking about life, quarter-life crises, movies, books, and quiet struggles. Just listen and feel less alone.
channel.itunes:author: La Wun
channel.itunes:summary: A soft, cozy podcast that feels like a long-distance friend talking about life, quarter-life struggles, movies, books, and the comfort of not being alone.
